page.title: 16RELIGION IN OUR AREA
page.content: {MR. DONALD}ENJOYS BEING A MINISTER BECAUSE HE FINDS IT VERY SATISFYING AND THAT THE WORK HE HAS TO DO IS THE WORK IS THE WORK HE WANTS TO DO. HE THINKS IT A GREAT PITY THAT THE CHURCH HAS RETREATED TO THE EXTENT THAT THERE ISN'T A MINISTER LIVING IN THE VILLAGE OF LILLIESLEAF.HE LIVES IN BOWDEN.HE THINKS THIS A PITY BECAUSE HE THINKS IT IS GOOD FOR A VILLAGE AND A PARISH TO HAVE A MINISTER LIVING INSIDE IT. LILLIESLEAF CHURCH WAS BUILT ABOUT{200 YEARS AGO AND HAS HAD SEVERAL PARTS ADDED OVER THE YEARS. AN{OLDER}ORIGINAL CHURCH WAS NOT PRESERVED AND IS NOW A RUIN IN THE {CHURCHYARD.} IN LILLIESLEAF GRAVEYARD THERE WOULD BE AT LEAST{60,000}PEOPLE BURIED IN THE LAST{800}YEARS.
